text: avarkal anaivarum yusuhpitam cenrapolutu, avar tan cakotaran punyaminai(t taniyaka alaittu) amarttikkontu (avarai nokki) ‘‘niccayamaka nan umatu cakotaran (yusuhp)tan. Enakku ivarkal ceytavarraip parri nir kavalaippatatir'' enru (irakaciyamakak) kurinar. (Anri, um'mai niruttikkolla nan or upayam ceyven enrar)
